Smart Trash Can: Create a trash can that can identify and sort recyclable materials from non-recyclable ones. The can will have a built-in sensor that can detect the type of material being deposited and sort it accordingly. The user will be able to view the contents of the can through a mobile app, allowing them to monitor their recycling habits and make adjustments as needed.

Trash Can with Built-in Composter: Design a trash can that includes a built-in composter. The can will have a separate compartment for food waste, which will be broken down by microorganisms in the composter. The resulting compost can be used as fertilizer for plants or gardens.

Interactive Trash Can: Create a trash can that can communicate with the user. The can will have a touch-sensitive surface that allows the user to interact with it. The user can ask the can questions about recycling, waste management, or other related topics, and the can will provide answers or direct them to resources for more information.

Trash Can with Air Purification: Design a trash can that can purify the air in the surrounding environment. The can will have a built-in air filter that can capture and remove pollutants and allergens from the air. The purified air will be released back into the environment, creating a cleaner and healthier space.

Trash Can with Augmented Reality Display: Create a trash can that includes an augmented reality display. The display will show educational content related to recycling, waste management, or other environmental topics. The user can interact with the display using gestures or voice commands, providing an engaging and educational experience.
